Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1519 PONCE DE LEON AVENUE,STOP 23, SANTURCE, SAN JUAN, 908, Puerto Rico

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: First BanCorp is a financial holding company. The company's operating segment includes Commercial and Corporate Banking; Mortgage Banking; Consumer (Retail) Banking; Treasury and Investments; United States Operations; and Virgin Islands Operations. It generates maximum revenue from the Consumer (Retail) Banking segment. The Consumer (Retail) Banking segment consists of the Corporation's consumer lending and deposit-taking activities conducted mainly through its branch network and loan centres. Geographically, it derives a majority of revenue from Puerto Rico.

value.name: Donald L. Kafka
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
